name: bad-bank
description: This app is a working model of a functional banking app that could be utilized to create an account that stores a balance of fake currency. The site allows a user to create their account, login, deposit or withdraw "money", and logout.

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd Back-end && npm run dev" "cd Front-end && npm start"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd Back-end && npm run dev" "cd Front-end && npm start"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix Front-end && npm run build --prefix Front-end

author: Erik Rice
